func.title: HSLa

param.name: byH
param.desc: Hue of the color. 0 is red, 85 is green, 170 is blue, and 255 is red again.

param.name: byS
param.desc: Saturation of the color. This is the color contrast.

param.name: byL
param.desc: Brightness of the color. A brightness of 0 would correspond to RGB(0,0,0).

func.desc: Creates a 32 bit color value from four parameters. Range is 0-255 for all parameters.

example.text: Colors this object in a somewhat transparent and spooky green.
